description.en:
UppsMe developed a project to maximize the actual usability of a crypto asset. UppsMe issues UPPS Tokens that can be used to transact all the needs of digital products on UppsMe App. All includes; PPOB (Payment Point Online Bank), internet quota or even to top up e-money. UppsMe was also born as penetration of the voucher and loyalty program industries (culinary, tourism, games, technology etc), which in these industries have shortcomings due to many limitations in its use.

UPPS Token is tokenized loyalty program reward, provide for online and offline business, with the following use cases: 
- Marketplace Platform: as a swapping platform of vouchers and rewards, UPPS Token is convertible with different kinds of vouchers and also can be a valuable measurement of vouchers. 
- Voucher Wallet: Customers are allowed to send vouchers to others
- Deposit Program: UppsMe uses a proof of stake concept, so customers can stake UPPS Token and earn more.
- Voucher Exchange: There will be no unused Vouchers. Customers can exchange the desired vouchers with fellow customers.
